_source.text: After following the rehydrating procedure for a month with no change in the appearance of the grains, and being told by customer service to just be patient, I bought some active grains from another source which are doing great, and got a store credit from Wise Choice which I turned in for some CFH milk kefir grains (which I hope will turn out better than the water kefir grains).
